Me poor auntie, God rest her soul, left this for me, but I have no use for it! Maybe a cultured one like yerself would appreciate her legacy propper.
'Twas a day like any other, ploughing the field, when m'boy dug this thing up! You like these things, don't ye? Don't worry, we already scrubbed it clean.
'Tatoes for dinner, 'tatoes for lunch, 'tatoes for breakfast, 'tatoes for snack, so many potatoes... Please rid us of the bloody stuff...!
I caught this scamp gobbling all my fish! But I couldn't bear to hurt it. Will you take care of it?
Nu-uh, too lanky!
His teeth are crooked as a donkey's!
Ugh, look at his spotless shirt, such arrogance!
Look at those scrawny shoulders! He'll snip in half if he tries to lift two potatoes!
Haven't you seen those dead fish eyes? He gives me the creeps!
He couldn't tell his mother from a sheep!
Too fancy for my taste.
My pigs! Gov'nor, you need to help me. See, they've escaped their pen. They're all we got, please get them back!
Me poor husband is missing! I am sick worried. When leaving he told me he was going to have a liquid lunch! What is this new fancy that took him?
Me child's a real headache, always messing around with the Jungers' lad. I bet he's loitering somewhere right now! Please find'im for me, give'im a good scold.
Is there no man in this town fit fer me? They are all intimidated by me wits! Ye know everyone in town, I assume? Find me a suitor!
Mon chat! Il est perdu! Please, find my little Antoine, he surely doesn't know his way back home...!
Bloody hounds have the whole neighbourhood on edge. I'm afraid they might bite my little boy one of these days! Lock them away, ye must!
That damned fox is eating all my hens! They are terrified, see? They haven't laid an egg in weeks! Please, gov'nor, help us catch the rascal!
Me pig's been stolen! It's one of the Willington lads I tell ye! See this big 'W' in the mud? Only their fancy boots leave prints like that!
Me chickens! I knew they were up to something...! Just when I was planning to bake my famous chicken pie they all escaped! Help me find them, won't ye?
He... he might do! Hmm, yes, I shall give this one a chance.
Oi, I heard they have sheep with really long necks in the other side of the world. I'd kill to see one! Could you show them to me?

What a great day! Two rival landowners family marrying their children! We're celebrating the union at the church. Peace will finally be back in the community. Take a daguerrotype of the happy couple to prove to everybody the war is over, will ye?
It's this time of the year again! The International Agricultural Show! We will show our most beautiful cows, proving we care better for our cattle here than anywhere else!
Me child's a firefighters' fanatic! He wishes to join the local squad when he grows up. If you could take his picture in the fire station it would mean the world to him
It's a pain, going back and forth to the well to fetch water. If only we had a fountain nearby we wouldn't have to carry all these buckets such a long way...
I'm always stumbling upon my tools! If you would be so kind as to build a shed for me, I could keep them organised.
This sun is a bliss for the crops, but a pain for my neck! I would be greatly grateful if someone were to plant a lush tree around here so we could rest under its shade.
I told Jeanine about the long, yellow fruits from the New World, but she doesn't believe me and now she's telling everyone that I'm a liar! Bring me some so I can rub them in her face, will ye?
I was hoping to have something really fancy for my wedding feast. You think you can get me some of that odd food in metal boxes that the rich enjoy so much?
Have you heard? Winter will be rough this year, they say! I'm a tad worried, we could use some extra firewood to keep the neighbourhood warm...

I went mushroom picking in the forest and met the most wonderful man, but we were so caught up in the moment that I forgot to ask his name! Do you think I might find him at the pub? Or maybe he's more of a club gentleman...?
I waited for hours, but he never came... I guess we were not meant to be... Still, thank you for caring, yer a true friend.
There he was, like you said! He was so happy to see me as well! We will remember your help, please take this with our thanks.
For once I have nothing to complain about! It deserve a gift to celebrate!
We have so much to eat that today my ward Oliver even told me "Sir I don't want more"! Please take this gift, we are so greatful.
Me pals all work in different factories, it's a pain every time we want to meet at the pub. Will you help me gather them up?
We got lost on our way to the mines and now the gang is separated! Could you find my pals? They're usually really merry!

My boy, he's passionate about the worker's struggle. Maybe a tad too much. See, he's been running around town handing leaflets and refuses to 'be oppressed by his bedtime'... Please help me catch him, boss.
It's always the same with Old Harold! We arranged our protest on the nineteenth, but out he goes on the ninth all on his own. His bad hearing is going to cost us our reputation! Please shut him up.
Could you point me the way to Ah Sing's house? He's got... good ways of making one forget about the hardships of work. It should be easy to spot by the- er... vapour.
You hear of Miss Alethea? She makes damn fine remedies for clogged lungs. But she lives so far in the mountain that I don't have the strengh to go there myself ...
He... he might do! Hmm, yes, I shall give this one a chance.
We dig dig dig dig dig dig dig in our mine the whole day through!
To dig dig dig dig dig dig dig is what we really like to do!
It ain't no trick to get rich quick if you dig dig dig with a shovel or a pick.
In a mine! Where a million diamonds shine! We dig dig dig dig dig dig dig from early morn till night.
We dig up diamonds by the score! A thousand rubies, sometimes more!
But we don't know what we dig 'em for. We dig dig dig a-dig dig, heigh-ho! It's home from work we go.
How am I supposed to brag about being in the fight club if I can't talk about the fight club? Oh, I know! The rules didn't say anything about takings pictures...!
Me mates and I have shared so many things in life. Jimmy's birthday is coming and there would be no gift more perfect than a framed picture of the whole gang in front of the brick factory we work at.
Bourgeois are like pigs, the fatter the stupier! If I am not to be welcomed in their proper gentlemen club then I will make an impression in my own way. Please take a picture of my moment of glory!
My son has always dreamt to become a firefighter. And now we have a firefighter station right by our home! Can you take a picture of him there?
All this smoke and soot takes a real tool on our bodies. My oldest, she's gotten sick as I've never seen her before. Do we have a place I can take her to?
Our work is pretty dangerous and not gentle on clothes. We workers spend evenings sewing them back! If only we had one of these sewing machines...
What is this weird brown thing these fancy people are eating? It looks weird but smell incredible. Would you be kind enough to give some of this chocolate to us workers so we can try it out?
I am a dad! We will drink all night to celebrate but we need better than beer this time! Can you give me a few bottle of this champagne the bourgeois are drinking?
It is so sunny, the ideal weather to roast some sausages and make hot dogs! Would you have some sausages and bread to spare so we invite the whole neighborhood?

We were competing to know who is the strongest man among us and I might have been a bit carried away ... I punched my wall very hard and destroyed it partially. Do you have some spare bricks for a sad winner?
The taste of beer is actually better ... Thanks still.
I want all my group to look as extravagant as these exotic people from the New World we see on the newspaper! Can you give us poncho so we can be as elegant?
Do these engineers think they are the only one who need to stay late to accomplish their craft? My art cannot wait and I will work all night for it! Please get me some coffee!
I have wrote the most incredible play about pirates! I will give a private lecture tonight to my followers but I feel the mood would not be right without bottles of rum. Could you provide some?
Sails are so romantic, much more than these steam engines delivering black clouds! Please give me some, I would like to create an artistic installation out of it!
We are all blind by modernity! It's only the small things in life that bring us joy! Would you please find a farmer family that would be so kind as to share their precious, simple life with me?
Erwan Grogg's in town touring his drama masterpiece! I could faint in his presence, could you ask him for his autograph for me? Oh, please, I beg of you...!
My daughter is a true spirit of nature, she loves to sing at the hills. But she often forgets she has worldly duties still, like taking care of the shop. Could you go find her?
My illustrious cousin is a pastry genious! But reality outside his baking station... overwhelms him. He just arrived in town and I fear he might have gotten disorientated!
I cannot believe my luck, to think that we would be blessed with Joseph Jaffersen's heart-wrenching acting...! He deserves a grandiose welcome! And I heard he's looking for a fine city to settle...

What an impossible fellow! My apprentice can not for the life of him sit still! I wanted to teach him the vitality of patience for our craft, but he's escaped to run around again! I'm sure you will help me catch the little rascal...
Ah, the hardships of the lowly life...! I... I don't think I am quite fit for this...!
These modern fancies... He'll be broken by noon! Forget it!
He'll only be a burden! We have no time for such nonsense!
He wants to work a simple life? Fine, he shall work! Bring him to us!

O, for a taste of distant shores and foreign lips and the elegant shadows of slender leaves...! Still, I cannot leave my earthly prison... To see that paradise, if only in a still picture, would take my breath away...

My precious Annabel Lee is about to start her journey to enlightenment! She will shine a light so bright on the world when she grows up, I am so proud...! Could you take a still of this treasured moment?

The marvelous joy of discovering the hidden gems of Earth's diversity! Is there anything more beautiful? My family would greatly appreciate a souvenir of this remarkable visit to the Zoological Garden.
It's our grand opening! Finally, our grandfather's dream of opening a factory of our own has come true. I would love to have a memento of this fateful day to inspire my grandchildren as well.

Monsier Dubois wants to take my lovely Rebecca away, but I shall not let him! I have challenged him to a duel and I must win! But... just in case... please take a picture to show my Rebecca my heartfelt deed!
I am hooked on knowledge, I know every single exhibit by heart! Dare I hope for a new one any soon? I don't think I can go without learning new wonders for much longer...!

I have read every book in my library from cover to cover at least a dozen times! I'd be thrilled to share my passion for reading with you! Will you accept this one? It's one of my all time favourites!
Ah, the great warrior cultures of the past, their endless bravery and power never cease to inspire me! Please accept this token of their strength, let it be the inspiration of many more!

It is finally finished: my most delicate work of art. Nay! My masterpiece. Since you have the most exquisite taste, you will surely appreciate my art and, dare I say, make it the centerpiece of your exhibition.
It's my favourite time of the year again, the best craftsmen in town all gather for the annual artisan fair! Aren't you excited to greet them and contemplate their masterful work?
Engineer would like to give you her newest invention.
Engineer would like to give you seeds for new plants to grow on your island.
Engineer would like to introduce you to a doctor ready to work for you.
Engineer would like to teach to Workers' children to grant them a better life.
Engineer would like you to meet with El Professor, a man who whishes to visit the city bank.
Engineer would like you to help Charles Darwin to conduct his study on evolution.
Engineer would like you to stop the Shelley couple from pulling pranks on gullible town people.
Engineer would like to find the exotic animals lost on your island.
Engineer would like to have a picture of her daughter and her in front of the university for graduation day.
Engineer would like to prove to people she worked on the steam engine.
Engineer would like to have a picture of her taken in front of a factory.
Engineer would like to have a picture of a train.
Engineer would like to receive tallow and quartz sand for her experiments.
Engineer would like coffee for her study group.
Engineer would like food to feed all her lab helpers.
Engineer would like high-wheelers to move in the city faster.
Engineer would like light bulb to prove to people the benefit of it.
Engineer would like to give you an enigma.
Almost everyone sees me without noticing me, For what is beyond is what he or she seeks. What am I?

Lovely and round, I shine with pale light,
grown in the darkness, a lady's delight.
What is it?
What is black when you buy it, red when you use it, and gray when you throw it away?

A time when they are green, a time when they're brown, but both of these times, cause me to frown. But just in between, for a very short while, They're perfect and yellow and cause me to smile!

What am I talking about?

You use me for my name, I'm not a breeze to tame, I'm fastest when I'm full and when it's cheap it sounds the same. You'll spot a nest near me (although I'm not a tree), the sea is fore, the sea is aft, it's all around, you see. What am I?

I run, it runs, I stop, it runs
What it it?

Investor wants you to remind his employee that despite Christmas being tomorrow, he better be on time for work!

Investor wants you to take a picture of his cheating wife.
Investor wants his picture taken to be a role model for the workers.
Investor would like a picture of him in front of his factory.

Investor wants champaign and cigars for his party.
Investor wants you to give him products to distract him.

Investor would like a gift for his grandchild birthday.

My pigs! Gov'nor, you need to help me. See, they've escaped their pen. They're all we got, please get them back!

Oi, I heard they have sheep with really long necks in the other side of the world. I'd kill to see one! Could you show them to me?
Oi, I heard they have sheep with really long necks in the other side of the world. I'd kill to see one! Could you show them to me?
Oi, I heard they have sheep with really long necks in the other side of the world. I'd kill to see one! Could you show them to me?
It's a pain, going back and forth to the well to fetch water. If only we had a fountain nearby we wouldn't have to carry all these buckets such a long way...
It's a pain, going back and forth to the well to fetch water. If only we had a fountain nearby we wouldn't have to carry all these buckets such a long way...
I told Jeanine about the long, yellow fruits from the New World, but she doesn't believe me and now she's telling everyone that I'm a liar! Bring me some so I can rub them in her face, will ye?
I was hoping to have something really fancy for my wedding feast. You think you can get me some of that odd food in metal boxes that the rich enjoy so much?
Have you heard? Winter will be rough this year, they say! I'm a tad worried, we could use some extra firewood to keep the neighbourhood warm...
A young boy is wandering in the forest, I saw him accompagnied by a panther and a bear! The community is worried, we cannot leave a child by himself!
Some members of the police are horribly corrupted, beating up people to pay immaginary taxes, resolving to even more violence if they don't. Please, you must act!
The jornaleros are very hard working but ... they are old you see. If you could tell them they have the right to take their legal break I am sure they will be less reluctant to take it.
My friend has been captured by pirates! Please, please help him! He was taken by Jean LaFortune, he must be on his island at the moment.
So many poor orphans, wandering in the street alone since their parents died during the revolution. They need help and shelter, if you find them I can provide it.
You have done so much for us and for our freedom. Please take this gift as a small gratitude.
I just celebrated my wedding and we have plenty of food we didn't touch. It would break my heart to throw it all away. Can you take it and distribute to the poor?
Finally Old and New World can communicate as equal! Please take this present, an artefact from my native culture, I would like to introduce the Old Town people to it.
This is by mother most beloved jewelry. I know it worths quite a bit but I know a lot of people need it more than I do. Please take it, sell it, use the money for the poors. I trust in your decision.

The revolution has succeeded! We are celebrating today the first anniversary of it and the editor would like to have a picture to illustrate his newspaper article. Since you are so key to our success, do you mind taking it?
This place is clearly the best place on Earth! If we were to publish a photo of the island I am sure people would come flooding to our little paradise!

We created a really modern society here, one where women working is seen as normality, a decision taken out of will and not out of necessity. Please, take a picture of us working, showcase it to the world!

These whale hunting stories are awful. People need to understand whales have feelings, experience pain and joy! They are magnificient creatures, please take a picture of them so I could try to raise awareness about their situation.

Some of my friends are still fighting a revolution against La Corona. If you were to provide weapons to me, I could transmit them through my underground network. This would be extremely useful for them.
The war is harsh for Isabel's people, their stocks are low and famine is close. Please, send us food, we know how to distribute it to those who need it the most.
Nights are cold around here and unfortunately numerous are the poors who have nothing to warm themselves. Please send me alpaca wool, I will make cosy blankets out of it.
The people here want to have the same chances as the ones in the Old World! Please build a museum so we can have a better access to culture.
Of the people, by the people, for the people. Now we are freed from tyranny it is important we have a town hall for our representative to work on improving the people lives.
Oh could you use a machine in one of our factories? I would love to see modernity in the making!
I wish we could have a book exhibition here! It would be so useful for educating people and how proud would we be to be the first natives of the New World to read the Old world classics!
So many people are fleeing the war. if you were to build new houses we could welcome more of them!

Farmers and their families are the foundation that feeds an empire.
Taking on manual labour and factory work, Workers are the backbone of industrialization.

The wealthy don't work, they have other people work for them.
He has weathered countless storms and steered many ships safely to harbours. Will his luck persist?
Bitten by the travel bug, nothing and no one can stop her from traveling the world.
A bright young journalist once determined to reveal truth, now struggling with the realities of his job.
Your sister Hannah, whom you left behind with your family and the business. She was never quite in father's favour like you were.
Your soulmate Aarhant, who has been accompanying you on your travels. There is a debt waiting to be repaid.
To Bente life is an exciting adventure full of thrilling discoveries and new friends waiting to be made.

He is a strict and efficient prison guard despite he always wished to enter the royal marina. He is actively looking for wanted pirates and outlaws of the crown. He is deeply loyal to the Queen and to the Commonwealth.

Can't be reproduced, but will do for some time.
What didn't grow before, now does.
Bred for faster growth.
The finest breed since 1404.
The gift of Kukulkan.
A bloody but efficient way of catching prey.
Takes over ships for a living.
Looks important and allows you to do things. Useful on expeditions.
Better than no sails, I guess?
Once shattered they were still useful to scribes in training.
A single beetle amulet was put within mummies to guard their journey.
The verdict is still out on whether cats are pets or gods or both.
How manifold it is, what thou hast made!
With a guardian this large, one can be glad it's made of stone.
Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!
Someone else's final resting place, now empty.
The journey of the dead described here is even longer than this books' journey.
Ancient ruler with striking red hair.
Not demanding anymore crackers.
"Mom, this is boring!"
The Nazcan monkey god grins away your envy.
Intricate patterns have been woven into this fine fabric.
Rags of what might have been clothing.
From the head of someone who chooses the worthy among the slain.
The contents have since been stolen.
Unidentifiable from all the fungi growing on it.
A seated figure wrapped in colorful, embroidered fabrics.
Burial jewellery of the continent's longest-reigning monarch.
Could it be the missing link between man and monkey?
Not a red beard, but his honorary title, Baba, led to his name.
Two of the three heads seem odd…
Very novel for its time.
An illustrious book with golden letters and colorful flourishes.
Two great bodies of work containing myths and legends.
Illustrations spanning hundreds of metres transcribed on pebbles.
Trade was as calculated then as it is now.
The poem about the legendary North king.
A poem about quarrels of Achilles and King Agamemnon.
A hero's adventurous ten year journey back home.
The current 5,125-year cycle will come to an end in 2012.
Geometric cubes intertwined in each other.
This god's gem allegedly controls the winds.
The stone's softness allows for intricate designs.
The fabled weapon capable of leveling mountains.
A delicate hammer that produced many famous jewellery pieces.
No craftsmanship is meant to last forever.
According to legend it granted Brünhilde her incredible strength.
Once painted extravagantly to bring jewellery to the poor.
The last abode of important people.
Its inhabitants are gone for a long time.
The proof of an early long trade with the New World.
The remnants of an ancient civilization, researchers believe human sacrifices were held here.
This puzzling mosaic seems to depict the birth of an ancient god of fire.
The fearless predator of old times.
More than a giant turtle.
Could eat on giant trees.
Eated sharks as appetizers.
The first expression of art.
The depiction of the first hunts of our ancestors.
The last remnants of the legendary temple.
Holded once a giant statue of fine work.
Those columns saw many, many events happen.
Some stones from the most visited place of Antiquity.
The precious art of the Ancient Empire.
Fine, fresh and colorful mosaics surviving the times.
A giant clock. Or temple. Or observatory.
The place where a fallen warrior joined nature for ever.
Thousands of sacrifices made for the gods in this holy place.
The intricate old designs carved by the ancients.
Old fictions containing past wisdom.
Poor money quality but very expensive at its time.
Rudimentary precious stone, yet fascinating.
The hole on its side shows its reliability.
Could still prevent some arrows to strike through.
Small piece of a goddess statue.
Just a toy for kids, or the sword of a poor.
The greatest pirate of all time's treasure.
The nobility hidden behind this veil disappeared.
Its size and sparkle are mesmerizing.
Must have belonged to the best warrior that ever been.
Some eggs from a past time that will never hatch.
Or noble wedding ring, or curse. Or both.
The deliquacy of the ornaments could make one hesitate to bring it to war.
The mythical sword of the prince.
Strange medicaments to cure blindness, melancholy and cuts.
The treasure of a rich private.
The common soldier's protection.
What history lies behind this beautiful jewellery?
The remnants of small animals diappeared today.
Simple but effective jewellery.
Some quality protection for those who went to war.
The sculpting of this rock became a glorious piece of divine art.
Elementary weapon that could resist a pair of battles.
Enough to buy some slaves in the past time.
The colors are still vivid thanks to the dry environment.
More like a useless ornament than a protection.
The pendant did not very well survive to the time.
Corroded due to the humid environment in which it was let.
and, as the hero brandished his sword toward the sun…'
Rather let it down than take it in combat.
Must have been nice hundreds of years ago.
Can be dangerous for unshielded warriors.
Giant standing stones telling unknown stories.
An old representation of the mighty ships.
Watch out for your finger food.
ara macao
The local predator.
Looks also good over the chimney.
Cute only when young.
Tursiops truncatus
Don't underestimate these killers.
King of the jungle, but far away from his kingdom.
Jelly source of irritation.
Alltogether, better than Picasso's paintings.
Underestimated predator by virtue of his cuteness.
A small version of dinosaurs.
A highly concentrated dose of poison.
A true ocean ballet when gathered.
The smallest birds ever.
Hypnotizes you before your death.
Dante's vision of hell in one bucket.
A marvel of natural design.
Don't mistake its fin for a shark's.
Can also serve for ball games.
Darwin's abyssal mistake.
Not that slow in the ocean.
Nom nom nom.
The legendary cat, trophy of tribal warriors.
"Look, Dad ! A huge tree trunk!" *banging noise*
If it's a cat, you're the mouse, now.
Worth the five men it took to catch.
inia geoffrensis
The emblem of the old empires.
The modern invader of modern cities.
Very common but very cute.
Not going to deliver anything anymore.
Can't be seen in the dark.
Men's best friend.
Carrier of goods and people.
Basically a sheep without the fluff.
A horse without a rider is still a horse, a rider without a horse is just a man.
For those who don't like farming machines.
Much brighter and cleaner than you think.
So fluffy!
Revered by almost everyone.
Likes hens and roosters.
Devourer of the dead.

Waiting lists replace estate agents.
Everything has its place
Working for a greater means.
“The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.” - Voltaire
Has caught at least three fish, that's three times as much as the average citizen.
Knows what a pearl looks like, unlike the last guy.
Can't imagine life without his ankles wet.
Sometimes forgets he's got actual legs.
Has sailed seven seas pursuing the mighty beasts.
The crew knows him as Steel Lungs.
Her fellow sailors swear she grows gills in the water.
The relentless Captain of the Pequed who took his crew to the ends of the earth in his pursuit to catch the greatest whale alive.
Only needs a nice pebble, a hook and some schnapps to make you an earring.
Hard not to be dazzled by her workshop.
Has seen colours you would never imagine in stone.
Doesn't even bother with anything less than 15 carats.
The incredible jeweller of queens. Entire fleets have sailed from every corner of the world for just one his dream-like tiaras.
Likes making bread.
Never forgets to bring a nice tray of cupcakes for everyone.
You would never believe what she can do with the right piping bag.
If you can stand his infamous temper, he'll make your palate dance.
His name is known in every royal court in the world. Those who can afford a taste from his exquisite spécialités claim that it's like taking a bite out of heaven.
His voice cheers even the laziest of workers.
A faint smell of dry leaves follows him wherever he goes.
Can identify every cigar brand in the Old World by their smoke alone.
Her exquisite hand-rolled cigars have ended lifelong rivalries.
The gentle Habano magnate that took his workers across the ocean and founded the flourishing cigar manufacturing town of Vincencity.
The stuff she makes would make a pirate gag.
Spends most of his time underground amid barrels.
His rum sells great in hospitals.
Prides on being able to taste the difference between Chardonnay champagne and the stuff they sell at the local pub.
Has served all kinds of people, from fancy investors to coarse sailors.
Knows every fermented and distilled beverage worth knowing in every continent.
The grand entrepreneur that took the delicacies of wine to new lands and established a flourishing enterprise.
Can carry a big bucket.
Helped put out four fires, driving the fire truck.
Has burning coals for breakfast.
Singled-handedly saved five people from the Great Sawmill Fire.
The great headchief that commanded the legendary Dragon Slayers Brigade for more than thirty years.
Has some very persuasive tricks in his holster.
Could sell a nut shell for the price of a schooner.
Knows about every boat that comes in and out of her jurisdiction.
Local producers refer to him as The Shield.
The ultimate defender of national self-sufficiency, whose economical reforms brought prosperity to an entire nation.
He can get you a glass of beer, just don't ask when was the last time it was rinsed.
Nothing like a stew and a home-made brew to forget about the roaches.
Not a bitter soul in the world that his fishpies can't comfort.
To this day, no one has passed through his threshold and left without a contented grin on their face.
Founder of the Black Bull, the greatest pub of all time. His unbelievable brews and unbeatable hospitality are known all over the continent.
Can tell when the 'H' is silent.
Can rarely be seen in the sunlight, mostly with her nose buried deep into a book.
Her strong voice inspires detailed images in her students' minds.
Has travelled the world researching the mysteries of ancient civilizations.
The acclaimed scientist who unveiled a reality invisible to human eyes, revolutionizing medicine, physics and chemistry forever.
Could tell you a couple of good places to spend the night, for the right tip.
With her help, anyone can discover every precious little corner of the city.
She was but eight years old when she led her first tour for visitors.
Thanks to his passion for both sailing and touring, his ferry company became renowned all across the country.
She founded the first travel agency, spreading her love for tourism to every corner of the world.
Born and raised in the fields.
Can carry half of her own body weight on her head.
Prides on being able to pick five tobacco leaves with a single move of the wrist.
Can't stand the feeling of not having dirt under his fingernails.
Has grown fifteen different species of tobacco plants in his back yard.
Got up on a tree as a kid and decided that was what she wanted to do for a living.
Her gentle respect for flora led her to devote her entire life to studying and growing all sorts of plants.
Has made an art of the cultivation of trees and plants, his flowering trees are considered living sculptures.
The director of the Botanical Garden who travelled throughout the whole continent to develop his meticulous and famous taxonomy, Flora of the Eastern Islands.
Smells like barnacles.
Has a keen eye for schooners.
A true authority on sailships.
One of the first hydraulic engineers to ever design a steamship.
The eminent naval architect who designed the Great Eastern, the largest ship ever built.
Makes damn good boilers.
Years of welding left her half blind, but she doesn't need her eyes much.
Has spent enough of his days at the foundry to know the casting process by heart.
He made swords when other kids were still playing with them.
His powerful hammer strikes gained him the nickname of Iron Arm.
Burning both her hands on an accident couldn't dissuade her from becoming the Master of the Forges.
The outstanding inventor that reshaped the process of steelmaking, becoming one of the most important innovators of the century.
People often mistake him for one of the apes.
Always barefoot.
Even the fiercest beast calms down in her presence.
For months she slept among the wolves, studying their behaviour, to the point where they accepted her as part of the pack.
The brilliant biologist that uncovered the realities of evolution and natural selection, defying all prior beliefs.
Remembers to say his prayers every night.
Can always spare a moment for those in need.
Her godly voice inspires courage in the hearts of her community.
The passion with which he preaches has united entire districts.
With great effort, he brought a new dawn to the Church and redefined its position in these critical modern times.
Sickly from birth, she experienced visions from a very young age.
Can wrap bandages efficiently tight.
Nothing that a good bloodletting can't fix.
Specialises in diagnosis and infectious diseases.
One of the brilliant minds that made ether anaesthesia safe for surgery.
Thanks to his exceptional research on vaccination and bacteriology, millions of lives have and will be saved all over the world.
A military surgeon not only concerned with the well being of wounded soldiers.
People laugh at him more than they laugh with him.
Has perfected the art of knock-knock jokes.
The theatre gets crowded every evening she's on stage.
Her acting makes even the coldest heart wrench.
The Queen of the Pose and the Princess of the Gesture, has toured around the world and starred on one of the first motion pictures.
He would rather be around trees than around people.
Forever covered in soot.
Smells of gunpowder.
Knows every path in the woods like the back of his hand.
The backbone of the industrial revolution.
Mind your step when you go for a walk in the forest.
Will protect even the tiniest bud with his life.
Deeply respects the might of the wildlife.
The mysterious guardian that dwells in the heart of the forest and knows every secret of Nature.
Always wears a fierce-looking fur cloak from a wolf he killed with his bare hands.
The renowned director of the Forest Academy, her unique understanding of Nature gained her international fame.
His greatest accomplishment in life was a foot sized potato.
Wakes up at dawn every day.
Her feet smell fruity.
Claims that no machine could ever do a better job than he does.
Grows the glossier red peppers.
Never needs a doctor, for he drinks a glass a day.
Thanks to her home-made fertilisers, event the clumsiest farmer can grow beautiful hops.
His studies on soil have increased the productivity on the whole district.
Her love for watching over crops as they sprout and grow ultimately turned her into one of the most respected authorities on agriculture.
Passionately believes in what technological advancements can do for agriculture.
Studied physics, chemistry and biology and travelled the Old World to come up with the most innovative farming solutions of the century.
His talent for crawling through tiny spaces finally got him a job.
His findings of oil deposits are more due to luck than expertise.
One of the toughest men on earth, or rather under it.
Her hands are a bit slippery, but she does a good job.
Thanks to his mastery on dynamite, he can create sturdy mining structures fast.
Has greatly improved her colleagues' chances of not being buried alive.
The man that first spotted gold on a riverbed and unleashed the great Gold Rush that attracted miners and prospectors from all over the globe.
She can fix anything with a fountain pen and a paper clip.
Once a top-performing member of the Royal Police Service, was fired for making his colleagues look bad by comparison.
The finest officer of her year.
The greatest mind in the force.
Her thirst for adventures is neverending.
His passion for History has brought him to every corner of the globe.
What is a ship without its captain?
What is a ship without its captain?
Loves rum and has got what it takes to live like a captain!
Has a famous ancestor and an aversion against driftwood.
A man of god and spiritual backbone of any expedition. You never know when you need one.
"There is nothing more unaesthetic than a policeman." ― Arthur Conan Doyle
"There is nothing more unaesthetic than a policeman." ― Arthur Conan Doyle
Commissioner Edd refers to himself as "the law".
In 400 nautical miles, turn left.
In 400 nautical miles, turn left.
Travelled the seas her whole live to visit the homeland of her name giving ancestor.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
Sometimes you just need to call the gal.
Sometimes you just need to call the guy.
Master of modern traps and guns.
Silent, adaptive, fast. No animal can escape this hunter.
Master of modern traps and guns.
Professional big game hunter who spent most of his life in southern Africa. An outdoorsman who finds cities and temperate climates unbearable. Very diplomatic toward indigenous peoples.
A professional artist with words.
Better with words than weapons.
As scion of an old noble family and youngest of nine siblings he quickly learned the subtleties of diplomacy.
Piece of wood, bearing the name of the sunken ship.
Enough for several harvests.
With these wheels on, your carts will barely notice any bothersome muddy potholes or loose cobblestones.
Your transportations can now catch up with the industrial race thanks to these steam powered carts! Only a little more expensive to maintain, but very fancy indeed!
Steam is old news! Electricity is the NEW new scientific revolution of the century! Implement Tilbury's line of electric carts and banish costly labour to the past!
Iron Framings greartly reinforce your building's structures to reduce the risk of fire catching up, so you can catch a breather!
Terrible infernos or ugly metal structures? You don't need to choose! These Cast-Iron Doric Columns will help prevent potential fires while still looking beautiful.
You want a glowing city, only not from conflagrations? Our Iron-and-Glass Magical Fire-Proof Architecture will stop any fire demons on its tracks and shimmer like a heaven made of glass!
Need something to call your workforce back to toil? With some extra care, this old bell should do the trick.
Your workers have trouble remembering the end of lunch time? Stop the slackers' moans with this Iron Factory Bell and get them to work already!

Thanks to the Oxford Electric Bell you can forget about shirkers forever! The still running clock will only require a power outlet to keep track of your workforce hours, ensuring they will not miss a single minute of their shift!
Need power but there's no powerplant in sight? That is exactly what dynamos were invented for! Disclaimer: might occassionally combust.
Generate stable electricity anywhere! Our Steam Turbines will safely and conveniently power up your buildings wherever they are, no connection to electricity towers required!
Piersons annouces his latest invention: the Turbo Generator! Its innovative system of turbine stages guarantees the highest safety, efficiency and power supply the market has to offer!
Your metallurgical industries need a boost? For only a little more damage to the environment, this calciner will improve the refining process.
Your heavy industries will revere this furnace! An advanced smelting process that will make your produce much studier and your worker's lives much easier.
Pricey molten processes belong in the past now thanks to the Bessamer converter, a furnace that will increase the scale and speed of your heavy industries' production like nothing ever before!
Need an extra help in your processing factories? For a small cost, a planer will make the metal cutting faster and enhace production.
Tired of wasting time on metal cutting? Upgrade your processing industries with a helical planer and speed up the annoying task!
You have never seen a faster metal cutting machine! Implement The Cutting Edge now in your processing factories and let electricity do all the work!
Put this millstone to work and lift that one from around your neck!
This French Burrstone will pulverise all your grinding issues to a fine, delicate mist!
The fantastic Grinding Machine Lieberman can grind anything and everything in a matter of seconds! The ultimate addition to your milling factories!
Precise chemical processing call for precise measuring equipment, like this mercury thermometer.
Another ruined batch in your chemical processing factories? This advanced melting point apparatus will rid your clueless workforce of having to guess the temperature ever again.

As far as temperature measuring tools go, no other matches the precision of the Thiele Tube. The frighteningly accurate system will ensure your chemical processing factories perform at frighteningly productive rates.
If your wood production is see-sawing, see to it with this bow saw.
Nothing brings two people together as sharing a two-man saw. Bonding while working works for all of the parts involved!
Why do it by hand when the Vaughan Drag Saw can do it for you? Using nothing but electricity, this unbelievable automatic saw can cut five times faster than any man-powered saw!
Set this trap and leave it overnight. Chances are you'll find something the next day. Then again, maybe you won't.
Some might call it cruelty, we like to call it effective! No beast, big or small, can evade the toothy grip of this leghold trap, and your hunters don't need to move a muscle.
Have a case of scrawny hares? Say goodbye to your hairy problems! This fur stretcher will immensely increase the fur surface of even the tiniest of preys!
Woods are taking up too much land? Keep your groves at bay with these secateurs.
Maximise your woods' efficiency and minimise their surface? You don't have to choose thanks to these convenient loppers.
Introducing the Original Lowe! The most advance pruning tool that can cut cleanly and with barely any effort thanks to its anvil system! Your woodlands have never been more efficient!
Are your farms in need of some fresh air? This plough can give your soil a breather.
This cast steel plough can multiply the toil of one farmer times four, so they have more time for sowing and tending to the crops.
Welcome to the 19th Century, when machines can do all the work for you! These steel seed drill sow your crops faster, more efficiently and probably better than any human being.
Wood ash might not be the most glamurous fertilizer out there, but still effectively reduces the required soil for your crops.
Cannot spare any more room for crops? These chemically developed fertilizers have been designed to extend your soil's prolificity to its fullest.
You will not believe your eyes after applying our Superphosphate fertilizers to your farms: crops will sprout from your soil like it's the Garden of Eden!
Bony livestock? With these vitamins, your animals should be nice and round in no time.
No one wants animals to die… At least, not ahead of time! Prevent sickly livestock from succumbing to disease with these antibiotics.
Have you lost count of how many livestock assets you have lost to anthrax? This vaccine will ultimately get rid of the bug and protect animals, population and investments alike.
You have no more space to leave your livestock strolling around? You can now cram them all up in these stables!
Your livestock will not want to go anywhere else —nor will it be able to— in these fully equipped barns!

Still treating your livestock like living beings? You can leave that in the past and make sure they are productively fat and packed into the tiniest space possible thanks to these revolutionary feedlots!
Cannot stand the stench your livestock farms let off? This shall keep it covered and contained.
Manage your livestock waste in a clean and sustainable way by buring everything under this covered laggon. The culmen of hygiene!
As elegant as waste management gets, this straw mixed compost shed will cover the stench of your animal farms leaving only green meadows and fresh air behind.
Your miners won't stop complaining? Add this freight elevator to lift their spirits.
This steam-geared elevator that can lift up to ten tons in one go is the perfect addition to your mining industries.
Simons latest elevator will dramatically reshape your mining scene! Performing solely on electricity, it has no rival amidst neither man nor steam-fueled machinery of its kind.
Easy to operate by even the dim-wittest miner, this medium sized auger is a very useful addition to your quarries' equipment.
Make a dent in your quarry industries with this steam-powered drill press that will easily bore through every kind of terrain.
This drilling rig's powerful electric motor allows it to bore into the Earth's surface like no other machine ever created before.
Is your cloth production fraying? Your weavers will be able to operate this mechanical loom even in their sleep!
Weaving by hand belongs in the past! With the appropriate power source and correct human supervision, these power looms can weave faster than the best knitter!
The speed of a machine, the care of a master crafter! Easy to adjust and powered by electricity, the Roberts Loom is the fastest, most reliable weaving machinery even conceived!
Disarray reigns in your assembly factories? Put everything back in line with this steam-powered conveyor belt.
Haven't you heard? The assembly line is the manufacturing process of the future! This one is powered by electricity and incredibly dynamic!
The Industrial Revolution is now! With this entirely mechanised factory, you will set a new landmark for mass-production assembly factories!
Is your gastronomy a little bland? This oven should spice up your cooking factories' process.
Heat up your local cuisine with this fancy cast iron stove, fit for the needs of every delicious treat-making factory.
Thermo-Electrical cooking made easier than ever with Smith completely electric stove, the latest cuisine revolution that will put a yum on every mouth!
Are your beverage industries stagnating? This brew kettle will make your concoction process all the more bearable.
All you need to add a spark to your beverages is this steam powered brewing machine! Shelves will soon be flooded!
Get your drinks flowing with this electric powered pump! It's system will not only accelerate the process greatly, but improve the resulting quality as well!
Lose sight of the tiny beads and pieces no more using this magnifying glass.
This precision monocular allows your watchmakers to see every tiny teeth and detail, making detailed crafting both painless and flawless.
The most comfortable, precise and agile loupe of them all, specifically fitted for the purpose of handling the smallest, most delicate of materials in watch and jewelery making.
Use this net to comb the waters and watch as your buckets of fish simply multiply.
Exhausted of waiting for fish to take the bait? Just set up this drift net and relax! You'll find a cornucopia of seafood goodness on your return.

We all know the best bits stick to the bottom. Now you can scrap the oceans with the unbelievable power of the Bricksham Trawler, the only fishing net able to tow up to 50 tons of fish out from the oceans depths!
With enough practice, anyone can blow perfectly spherical glass bubbles through this blowpipe.
Do away with the lengthy glass-making process with the help of this mechanical press that can easily shape molten glass in a matter of seconds.
The first fully automatic glass-blowing machine! Owens design allows to blow fifty glass pieces simultaneously and faster than the most skilled craftsman requiring nothing but electricity!
Lend your carpenters a hand with this circular saw, but make sure they follow regulations and keep their own hands.
Plug this circular rip saw to your carpentries and watch it glide through wood, glass and metal alike.
This revolutionary electric lathe can shape wood and metal like dough, outlining perfect pieces in seconds.
This moulds can shape any malleable substance into perfectly even squares and perfectly even squares only.
This hydraulic press will ensure every block has the exact required density, a guarantee for sturdy, high quality construction materials.
No other human nor machine has ever produced faster, more solid masonry materials than this compacting molding machine.
What is a town without golden waves of grain fields? These seeds can help you sprout at least a couple.
What is a town without golden waves of grain fields? With these seeds, you will be able to make it sprout anywhere.
What is a town without golden waves of grain fields? These selected seeds will sprout beautifully wherever you sow them!
Desperate for a drink? These seed will sprout enough hops to quench your thirst, at least a little.
Desperate for a drink? Make healthy hops grow anywhere sowing these seeds.
Desperate for a drink? These selected seeds will sprout beautifully wherever you sow them!
A starchy problem? Take these sprouted potatoes anywhere and they will grow a little.
A starchy problem? These sprouted potatoes will grow healthy as any endemic crop.
A starchy problem? Export these high-quality potatoes anywhere you need and they will take solid roots!
O, for a draught of vintage! These scrawny vines will yiled scrawny grapes, but scrawny grapes are better than no grapes at all!
O, for a draught of vintage! Give these vines a few days and it will be as if they had always grown there.
O, for a draught of vintage! You have never seen plumper grapes than the ones that will soon heavy down these sturdy vines wherever you plant them!
Peppers don't ring a bell? Some of these seeds will become the plump goodness soon enough. Then again, some won't.
Peppers don't ring a bell? Wherever you plant these seeds, the tasty vegetable will crop up.
Peppers don't ring a bell? The colossal, shiny, sweet bell peppers that will sprout from these seeds do merit for a more alluring name!
Indulge your sweet tooth! These sugar saplings might not be juiciest, though still better than saccharin!
Indulge your sweet tooth with these syrupy sugar saplings! Or plant them and get even more!
Indulge everyone's sweet tooth! Let these premium sugar cane saplings colonise your fields and hearts with their delightful nectar!
If you need a smoke, these seeds should grow into average quality tobacco leaves.
If you need a smoke, sow these and tobacco leaves will soon puff up as if they had been there all along!
If you need a smoke, you are in luck, for you have never lighten up a higher quality leaf than the ones these seeds will sprout!
Dreams of clouds of cotton? These mixed seeds have been proved to result in immaculate, if slightly meager, white fluff.
Dreams of clouds of cotton? Sleep tight after sowing these cotton seeds, for the fluffy results are certainly guaranteed.
Dreams of fluffy clouds of cotton? Sow these selected cotton seeds and watch as heaven arises from the earth!
Cocoa cravings? Plant these raw cacao beans and get some nibs!
Cocoa cravings? Spread the joy of chocolate wherever you go with these cacao beans!
Cocoa cravings? You will not be able to stop nibbling on the exquisite beans these cacao beans will grow!
Unable to bounce back without caoutchouc? Bring these saplings of the sappy tree wherever you need it.
Unable to bounce back without caoutchouc? These caoutchouc saplings will make the ductile material flow anywhere you plant them.
Unable to bounce back without caoutchouc? Get tacky rivers of white gold flowing from these superior caoutchouc saplings!
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Take these coffee beans with you to never miss a cup.
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Bring your population back to life with these coffee beans.
Having trouble waking up without caffeine? Export the fragrant, delicious pungency of these selected coffee beans to put a toasted full stop on morning drowsiness.
If you are feeling corny, bring these mixed corn seeds with you to grow the golden tidbits.
If you are feeling corny, plant these seeds and watch them become a steady supply of shiny ears of corn.
Are you feeling corny? Plant these selected corn seeds and soon you will be buried in mountains of sweet golden kernels!

Bluehead's avant-garde torpedo will revolutionise your naval offensive with its compressed air underwater propelling and its precise explosive warhead thanks to its gyroscopic course-correction system.
Effective as ever, these mortars can be mounted onto your ship to bombard your enemies from above with explosive shells.
These cranes will lift the burden off your shipwrights shoulders and greatly hasten the shipbuilding process.
Your shipwrights will have all they need to repair your ship in the midst of the battle with these portable set of ship repairing tools.
Nicknamed Lucky Charm by the 3rd Brigade, stories of the great victories that followed after he operated the turrets precede him, infusing his comrades with a sense of invincibility.
Spread the battle rage throughout your ranks with the acoustic amplifying power of this megaphone.
Knows everything about the potato.
The backbone of civilization.
Universal eaters, eaten universally.
No painted horses this time.
Tranquil giants with an eternal memory of their home.
Worth the five men it took to catch.
Speak softly and carry a big stick.
The movement entrusts you part of their territory.
One sheep, two sheep, three sheep ...
Notes about a mysterious land far far away.
A symbol of luck for the easily led.

Brought back from the New World's mountains, these animals showed adaptation to life in the highlands, which made the alpaca a very reliable pack carrier. Farmers and Jornaleros can easily take advantage of these agile animals for their daily work.

Majestic creatures from the taiga, usually hiding in the cold northern coniferous forests around the globe. The sight of animals surviving in harsh climatic conditions encourages your people to show temperance in their own food consumption.
Mythical creatures brought back to the world of reality. The true existence of these monsters will for sure inspire creative writers in your city.

The demons from the abysses, the legendary killers in the sea that you never want to face out of their fishtank. Bringing these killers into your zoo teaches your people about escaping sharks attacks and about general submarine animal behaviour.

Originating from the Amazon Basin, these animals from the tropical rainforest show a panel of vivid colors in their fur, feathers and skin which has no equivalent in the Old World. The decoration taste in your city will directly be impacted by this natural artistic show.

The great white desert of the far North overflows with noble fauna of immaculate fur and feathers. The sight of these creatures from the terra incognita will encourage more people to make exploration their vocation.

The exotic fauna endemic to the oriental rainforest, traveled through for ages by merchants of the Silk and Incense Roads. The display of this specific biome will attract rich visitors from afar, leaving some exotic products in your harbor.
These farm animals bring nothing new to discover to your visitors, but for sure enables your people to learn more about domestic animal care and reproduction.
The variety of animals living along the Great Reef Barrier is a source of knowledge and admiration for the children witnessing also dolphins shows.
The display of the splendors of the ancient empire, well known for building magnificent cities and infrastructure. Gathering their remains will inspire safer architecture against higher taxes.
The dreadful funerary remains of a mysterious civilization from the New World, brought to your visitors. A got-to destination for any leading figure fond of esotericism.
The first steps of our ancestors through the wildlands of the prehistoric era displayed to the public. Brings back basic knowledge of resources gathering for survival.
The soul of formerly knowned terrors of the seas, stealing everything on their way. A new spirit of piracy will inhabit your sailors.
The admirable religious architecture and mythological parchments left by the ancient cities of the Aegean. Your people will want to play their famous tragedies in theatres.

The colossal ruins of the abandoned stone cities hidden below the New World's jungle canopy, where the legendary El Dorado should still stand. Learning more about this civilization may help discovering the Golden City.
Mythological remains of the northern culture spreading fear and destruction for centuries on the Old World's coasts. Their passion for war and fear of nothing may inspire your fighters.

The most important geological discoveries, teaching your visitors about origins of history and life. While serving as open university, your museum's exhibition may also reduce the church's attendance for good.
The remains of a protohistorical civilization, known for its circles of stones and enchanted forests. Your quarries and forests will reflect their inherent beauty to the initiated visitors.

The Cordillera park in your zoo inspires your Farmers and Jornaleros to take advantage of alpacas for their daily work.
The Boreal forest Park in your zoo encourages your people to show temperance in their own food consumption.
The Extinct Species Park in your zoo inspires creative writers in your city. They will regularly ask for your help.
The Ocean Predators Park in your zoo teaches your people a lot about general submarine animal behaviour.
The Amazon Basin Park animals in your zoo inspire new colorful decorative pattern in your city.
The Great North Park in your zoo promotes vocations of exploration among your people.
The Bengal Jungle Park in your zoo attracts rich merchants from afar.
The Farm Animal Park teaches more arbout domestic animal care and reproduction to your people.
The Great Barrier Reef Park in your zoo teaches everything to the children and increases the happiness of workers and artisans.
The Eagle Empire Exhibition in your museum inspires your people to build safer architecture and convinces them to pay higher taxes.
The Andes Tomb exhibition in your museum attracts many leading figures fond of esotericism to your city.
The Mankind Origins exhibition in your museum reminds your people ancestral knowledge for resources gathering.
The Skull and Bones exhibition in your museum converted all your sailors into piracy.
The Aegean Culture exhibition in your museum promoted litterature in your theatres, that now play ancient tragedies with an high attractiveness.
The Lost Cities exhibition in your museum contains some sources about the legendary El Dorado. Merchants will regularly bring gold from the legendary city.
The Northern Sagas exhibition in your museum inspires your people with a warring spirit empowering your military.
The Jurassic World exhibition in your museum destroys the theory of creationism in favour of evolution theory, taught life-sized.
The Megaliths Spirit exhibition reminds the beauty of natural landscapes like quarries and forests to your people and visitors.
Rumour has it that hostile ships are on the route this expedition will take.

The Admiralty advise that we prepare for diseases on this expedition.
It seems that only battle-seasoned sailors apply for this expedition. We ought to expect some hand-to-hand combat.

The island Prosperity, the cause of all trouble for your father, was allegedly sold by him to the Queen's enemy Isabel Sarmento. She is in hiding though, being a rebel leader of The Movement and living in a world of constant turmoils.
We received news of a maritime accident, it is our duty to rescue who and what we can!
The Admiralty has exposed the whereabouts of some pesky pirates who terrorize the area.
Crazy Description of Test Expedition containing unresistable teasers
This expedition is used to test a specific event.
Lady Faithful asks you to secure a foothold in the Arctic, from which you can begin your search for her husband Sir John.
Finding the Prosperity selling contract is crucial to prove that your father had no part in it.

NEW ARTICLE!
This article still needs a headline and text.
FIRST FARMERS LAND
Farmers flock to join [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], hoping to prosper from the earth as they always have done.
BOLD NEW ERA!
Workers take up the [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] challenge, trading sleepy plough for bright industrial futures!
FRESH CULTURE!
Artisans lend sophistication to [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], exhibiting a flair and flourish that was formerly but a dream.
PUNCTUAL AND PRACTICAL
Engineers bring order to [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] chaos! Books, telescopes and chemical flasks under arm!
THOROUGHBREDS IN THE STABLE
Investors show their class at [Participants Current Profile CompanyName], tossing their money into the air, as if the bally stuff grew on trees.
LOGGING IN
New Sawmill in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] can be 'spark to shape future', beam branch workers.
A NEW LINE
New Fishery flaps into life in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as residents become hooked on fish.
OH SCHNAPPS!
New Schnapps Distillery has people of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] in tremendously high spirits!
GOSH DARN
New Framework Knitters stitched together in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as remarkable story continues to unravel.
BRICK BY BRICK
New Brick Factory fires up [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as island builds for the future.
HOT SAUSAGE
New [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] butchery slaps succulent sausage on the table, a centrepiece everyone can afford!
SET SAIL!
New Sailmaker breezes into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], are ships too then on the horizon?
BAKE OFF
Fresh Bakery rises in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], to leaven the mood on the island.
STEEL BEAMING
New Furnace in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] sees its commanding chimneys reach up to the heavens, to pluck down juicy, soot-tinged fruits of progress.
OVERALL IMPROVEMENT
New Workwear Factory in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], means employees everywhere no longer need mention the word trousers!
ARMED AND DANGEROUS
New Weapons Factory means [Game Profile Info Name] has the competition firmly in its sights.
BATHING IN GLORY
Wondersoap bubbling out of new factory in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], has citizens scrubbing up exceedingly well!
ROLL OUT THE BARREL
New Brewery in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] brims with desire to quench the town thirst.
PANE RELIEF
New Window Factory in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] sure to be a smash.
TOWN SEALS CANNERY
New Cannery opens in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], to quite a receptacle crowd.
GOOD TIMING
New Pocket Watch Factory sprung upon [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], and not a moment too soon.
RUM TIME
New Rum Distillery uncorked in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], to a lengthy drum roll.
A SWEET MOMENT
New Chocolate Factory unwrapped in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], to temper sticky cocoa craving.
WHEEL PROGRESS
New Bicycle Factory now peddling in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], locals are pumped up.
STRENGTHENING EFFECT
New Reinforced Concrete Factory keeps [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] in the mix with rivals.
BRILLIANT ACHIEVEMENT
Flashy new Light Bulb Factory in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] sure to guide way to enlightenment.
FIZZBANG!
New Champagne Cellar pops open in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], to everyone's great surprise!
COAT HANGAR
New Fur Trader slinks into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], read on for more complete coverage.
NEW LEAF
Fresh Cigar Factory rolls up in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], demand is cut and dried.
MUSIC TO THE EARS
New Gramophone Factory whirrs into life in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. Just for the record, here's our correspondent's spin.
MASTERS OF WAR
New Heavy Weapon Factory in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] propels town to bleeding edge of warfare.
PRECIOUS MOMENT
New Jewellers brings sparkle to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], or at least gives a nice ring to it.
HORSELESS CARRIAGES!
New Carriage Assembly Line starts up in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], investors not getting carried away.
BEHOLD THE SEWING MACHINE

Sewing Machine Factory bobs into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], producing machines regarded as a seismic advance in the world of textiles! A stitch in time saves nine, they say; and so with the new patent sewing machine— no more thimbles!
WHAT A SPECTACLE!

Spectacle Factory blinks into life in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. It looks a long-sighted move, with so many opthalmic conditions made tolerable. Why not hold this very article fifteen inches from the eye, and see if it still legible?
FRESH COFFEE

Coffee buzz in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as daily grind begins! Town experiences flurry of stimulation; our own publishing house has never been so wonderfully jittery— there are circular brown stains all over the copy!
FRIED PLANTAIN DELICACY

Fried Plantains arrive in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. Locals swear recipe is authentic, which is a relief, because we ourselves would never have thought to fry in fish oil! For other recipes using fish oil, see right at the very very bottom of p. 51.
PLUSH PONCHOS!
Ponchos become part of the fabric in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as locals snuggle up in finest alpaca wool, making fittingly soft snuggling noises.
PRAISE THE MAIZE!

Tortillas ready in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], as locals perform ritual celebration of corn. A legacy of ancestors in the region, a staple of liberation and independence, it shall go marvellously with a prickly pear, or a pricklier chilli!
BOMBINS IN FASHION!
Bombins bowl into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. Hats thrown into the air at the news, then trampled into the dirt, as beautiful Bombins become the new trend!
MARK IT!
With new Market trading in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], the settlement really sets out its stall.
PURE CONVENIENCE!
Pristine new wash house wafts virgin scent of clean linen over [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName].
BOTTOMS UP!
Terrific tavern in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] flings open doors to cheery citizens athirst for revelry!
BLESSED ISLE!
Unveiling of resplendent makes [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] 'pious as St. Peter's tootsies,' says cheery priest.
STUDY IN SUCCESS!
Assembly of superb new School increases town reputation as hotbed of genius.
BOHEMIAN VARIETY
New Cabaret kicks [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] into life, with allure of its exotic experiences.
PROGRESS BY DEGREES
New University founded in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], its benefit to society is surely academic.
EXCLUSIVE!
New Members Club taking memberships in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], naturally the doors won't be opened to just anyone...
NEW MONEY
Bank opens first accounts in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], 'it's a credit to this city,' say local authority.
RINGSIDE SEATS

Boxing Ring punches its way into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. There are no shortage of willing fighters, so popular is the crunch of knuckle on cheekbone; full list of odds and fighters below...
DRAGON SLAYERS
New Fire Station bell rings in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], let the noble fight against this beastly flame commence!
EYES PEELED
New Police Station plods into action in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] laying down lovely law.
INFIRMARY OPENS
New Hospital now operating in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], located with surgical precision, so as to best relieve community.
WONDER IN STORE
Capacious new warehouse 'signals ambition,' says local authority, as carts begin wheeling their way up and down the avenues.
WELCOME TO ALL
New Visitor Harbour in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], guaranteed to bring tourists to these shores in droves.
ANIMALS RELEASED ON PUBLIC!
New zoo intoxicates crowds in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] with animal aroma of the exotic. As to exact specimens, watch this space!
ANIMALS EXTENDED
New extension for [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] zoo opens. Our correspondent observes, unsure if something roams there, or if it was actually empty.
MUSEUM UNVEILED
New museum in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] among first institutions to open eyes of public to wider world.
MUSEUM TAKES WING!
New museum wing drape falls in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], revealing something historic.
COAL'S THE GOAL
New Coal Power Plant steams into [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], already creating a bit of a buzz.
OIL IGNITES PROGRESS
Slick new Oil Power Plant burns in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], greasing the wheels of progress.
COAL FACE
Bespoke Coal Harbour built in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], so boats may scuttle in and out.
OIL FILTER

We are as happy as we can possibly be,' the hysterical people squeal, as they dance the euphoric streets of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName].
HAPPINESS AND LIGHT

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is quite full of mirth! "Eight and three-fifths from ten is how I score my present feeling," one resident remarked during recent census, "yet I am not completely delirious..."
PEOPLE JUST ABOUT CONTENT

[Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is a dull, occasionally satisfactory place to live, according to residents. Why is this town so run-of-the-mill, when it could be so very much more? We detail in full pp. 3-7 exactly what makes life here so bland...
UNHAPPY HOME!

Local hearts filled with woe in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Streets wet with tears, as residents weep for the neglect! "I still want to believe in this place," says one we met, "But the dream is dying!"
PEOPLE ARE FURIOUS!

Anger at living conditions in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Residents on verge of drastic action to end hardship! Our newspaper maintains responsibility to report the grievous situation of the people, though our livelihoods may suffer for it!
GENERAL MOOD IMPROVES!

Happier days return to [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Either people have learned better to cope, or indeed as this paper believes, living conditions have demonstrably improved in recent times. More grounds for domestic optimism pp. 5 & 6.
GENERAL MOOD DETERIORATES!

Mood slumps in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as reality of living conditions hit home. Something must be done to recover this city to former glory! With the assistance of local residents, we have compiled a long list of the most urgent improvements...
STILL NO MARKET!

The lack of fresh produce available in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is thoroughly depressing! When will the city council see sense and provide the people the variety and bounty of a proper market?
FIN!
Scarcity of fish in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means very backbone of society will collapse.
LIFELINE SCHNAPPED!
Scarcity of Schnapps in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means very essence of society will evaporate.
DEADLY DEFABRICATION!
Scarcity of Work Clothes in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means very fabric of society will collapse.

Lack of pub in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is a jolly poor show. If there's one thing that could bring this disparate community together, it is ale, a roaring fire, and a trio of fiddlers!
WURST CASE SCENARIO!
Scarcity of sausage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means very fabric of society will collapse.

Scarcity of bread in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to half-baked management means society will collapse in on itself.

With no church in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], gossip grows elsewhere that town is cauldron of devil worship. Of course nothing could be further from the truth!— But while there is no church, we shall continue to be branded with the hoof.
SOAP SCANDAL!
Scarcity of soap in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means very fabric of society will collapse.

Scarcity of beer in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] due to shameful mismanagement means soul of society has drained away!

Lack of a school in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] means locals are really thick. We can but hope some sentience may emerge from this pool of ignorance, and put things to right by building one.
CAN-TASTROPHE!

Fur coats go missing in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Animal retaliation theory disproven, as Town council shoulders all responsibility.

Shortage of Pocket Watches in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] damaging efficiency! With time ticking on, officials are under pressure to solve the matter post-haste!

Lack of Electricity supply throttling [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] production! Authorities charged with ensuring supply resumes quick as a flash.

Continuing lack of Bank in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] has moneymen drawing on new reserves of patience, as cash spills out of bedsprings everywhere.

Champagne shortage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] takes the fizz out of life. Trust in authorities put on ice, as supply continues to falter.

Shortage of Cigars in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is nothing but a headache for wealthy investors hoping to get their circulation back.

Gramophone shortage in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] as machines prove too popular. "Music shouldn't be this popular," rants frustrated snob, "Only those who truly know how to listen should be allowed them!"

Tortillas extremely thin on the ground in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], leaving city feeling flat. "They better scoop us out of this soon, or the whole thing will leave a very bad taste in the mouth."

As positive credit balance hastens era of untold prosperity, owner of [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] said to have Midas touch, by ecstatic following.

Income no longer negative for [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] say delighted accountants.
BACK FROM THE RED!
[Participants Current Profile CompanyName] bounce off the ropes of bankruptcy, their accounts no longer overdrawn.

ETHICAL BUSINESS
As luxurious terms return for working folk, liberals and workers alike heap praise upon altruistic benefactors of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName].

Lack of farmers in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] mean problems for local produce. "We need all the help we can get if the harvest is not to be a disaster," says one disgruntled local, left in the lurch.

Lack of able workers causing problems for industry in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. "I told the guv, I don't have the experience to work in this section alone," said one chagrined employee, wishing to remain anonymous.
LACK OF ARTISANSHIP

Too few Artisans in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] means local craft will suffer. "When I said I enjoyed the isolation, I didn't imagine being forever alone..." weeps beleaguered local dandy, hand upon brow.

Not enough Engineers in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] to keep city in good working order, says survey. "It's terrible, the lack of investment in further research," pencil-chewing curiosity remarks. More bad science, pp. 19-20.

JORNALEROS TOO FEW

Obreros are too few in number to keep their visioon of the future alive in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]. "This place, is too much in the past. When will we grow and move on?" says earnest and principled resident.
AMONG THE STARS
As first lucky visitors arrive in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], the superb resort duly takes its place among galaxy of stellar destinations.

Distinguished guest gifts generously to fabulous [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], stating 'rarely have I seen such wonder, in all my years of travels.'

Splendid [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is now the most visited island in existence. It is a beacon of hope, a torch of progress, a paragon of hospitality!

Inferno utterly guts [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], 'this city is damned!' croaks broken local.

Demonic inferno dies out in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] but this is little consolation for the owners of fire-gutted property.

INFERNO THWARTED
Special measures save [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] from the ravages of staggering inferno.

BLOODY REVOLUTION IMMINENT!
People of [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] 'hell-bent on unleashing era of terror', say those who have seen them polishing pitchforks.

Local riot in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName] is 'first raindrop' that foreshadows the 'flood of revolution,' says fearful onlooker.
CITY DAMAGED AFTER RIOT
Those who said it was storm in a teacup, now complaining that their laps are burned.

Administration fortunate that concerns of populous have subsided naturally. But for how long?
ORDER RESTORED
Riotous spasm is quelled in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], local governor expresses relief that deterrents are working.
RIOT STOPPED AT SOURCE
Special provisions prevent spread of riot in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName], corking shut bottle of discontent.
VOLCANO OF VIOLENCE!
Cataclysmic revolution in [Newspaper FindArticle([RefGuid]) Context TownName]! Lava of public fury erupts and swallows the streets! End is nigh!

Any relief that ugly revolution has ended is overshadowed by doubt of whether damaged city will ever be the same again.
